formatDescription: A Kodak DCS RAW image is a digital camera raw file from Kodak's Digital Camera System (DCS) series, saved in a proprietary format based on the Tagged Image File Format (TIFF). These files contain uncompressed, unprocessed image data.
provenanceCompoundName: Brigham Young University / Brigham Young University

internalSignatures.name: Kodak DCS RAW Image v.3
internalSignatures.note: Absolute from beginning of file, magic bytes: II*.{12}KODAK{11}(DCS|EOSDCS)
